committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the railroad retirement system.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) continued Federal commitment to the railroad retirement system is essential to assure the integrity of railroad retirees' benefits; and (2) preservation of such system's present structure, including the administrative framework of the Railroad Retirement Board, is necessary to fulfill the Federal Government's time-honored responsibility.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the railroad retirement system.
